sentence: (Brian Kemp 2022 reelection campaign) The narrator in the spot emphasizes that the governor is helping families make ends meet by lowering taxes and creating good paying jobs, easing the burden at the gas pump, giving parents more control of their kids education, fighting to reduce crime.
